p: The result of the cytotoxicity experiment was expressed as % viability of human cervix adenocarcinoma (HeLa) cells when treated with 50 µg/mL of crude extracts. The result showed that all extracts were not cytotoxic, as HeLa cells presented 98.95 ± 3.82 and 98.56 ± 9.54 % viability in water and ethanol extracts, respectively ( Figure 1a,b). This revealed that the consumption of the velvet bean of M. pruriens is non-toxic and hence safe.
